titleStmt.title: The complaint of a sanctified sinner answered: or An explanation of the seuenth chapter of the Epistle of Saint Paul to the Romans deliuered in diuers sermons. Preached by Edward Elton, Bachelour in Diuinitie, and preacher of Gods Word at Saint Mary Magdalens Barmondsey neere London. An now by him published, intending the common good and profit of Gods Church.
titleStmt.author: Elton, Edward, d. 1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Stansby, for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Blacke Beare,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
